Plot: A young orphan girl's adventures in finding a family that will take her.
Title: Annie
Actors: Albert Finney, Carol Burnett, Ann Reinking, Tim Curry
tomatoConsensus: John Huston proves an odd choice to direct, miring Annie in a sluggish, stagebound mess of an adaptation, but the kids are cute and the songs are memorable.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 2 wins & 11 nominations.
